name: Six Savior
description:
Legend of Six Savior in Animal Land. When Destruction coming to the world. Six brave animal receive Mission to find 9 Crystal to Save the world. Feature

- Play as 6 animal with 6 different Tactic

- Play in 3 Differrent Location in the world and all have different element.

- Co-Op With your friend to finish mission.

- Find the best way to clear puzzle and finish Mission.

- 8Bit artstyle with retro Style sound.

How to Play

W A S D : Control Character

E : Punch Object

W : Get in the Door (When the door is open only)

Created by

- Anuruk Nuntarat

- Tanapong Chantanoi

- Natthakorn Na Phattalung

- Puttipong Rungrueng

- Anawin Sungyai

- Chayachairat Pengpinit
